# Diagonal Directed Graph Visualization

Functionality to print directed graphs as ASCII art.

```text
+-A-+-----------+
|   +-B         |
|       +-C-----|-------+
|       |     D-+       |
|       |       +-E-----|-------+
|       |       +-----F |       |
+-------|---------------+-G     |
        |                   +-H |
        +-------------------+---+-I
```
